title: Can I use your blogs on my website? - Quora

response.answer_text: Of course you can. Blogs on any website is a must. A blog page helps you in ranking and seo[1] things. You can also earn through your blogs. The only trick here is that your content should be unique and concise. Like you might have seen or rather read scoopwhoop’s contents/blogs, they are very unique and short. At the same time very interesting. Blog is like giving any piece of information for free. Make your knowledge transparent. Don’t give any hidden content on your blog. Then only you’ll gather a good quality and quantity of visitors. I hope it is useful. Thanks. Footnotes[1] Webnisation|Website design and development company

Give credits.If you are genuinely interested, you should mention other’s blog as a hyperlink in your OWN blog posts.Let us know the reason why you are so curious to use other’s blogs on your website. The use case helps understanding the problem statement better :p
Ya sure , if you like you can use. My blog URL link address is: Indigenous Science & Tech
